content.p: We are the largest American and Canadian Studies department in Europe and pursue an ambitious research strategy in the field of North American literature, history, culture and politics. The Department of American & Canadian Studies at Nottingham is delighted that 96% of its research activity was assessed as 'world-leading' and 'internationally excellent' according to the results of the REF2021 (Research Excellence Framework). Our research specialisms American foreign relations, politics and culture Find an expert Our research programmes Using language to explore eating disorders in men Art, empire and monuments International centre of excellence on the country See more examples of the impact of our research Find out more about research ethics
